name: Retrieve Devices with pipeline status
func:
msg.topic = "" +
" SELECT Devices.mac, Patterns.pattern,  Devices.brightness, PipeLines.status " +
" FROM Devices" +
"   INNER JOIN PipeLines" +
"     ON Devices.pipelineId = PipeLines.id" +
"   INNER JOIN Patterns" +
"     ON Devices.patternId = Patterns.id;"
;
return msg;

func:
msg.topic = "Select id, serverId, pipeline, status from PipeLines;";
return msg;
